name: Ghosts on the Quad Demo
description:
Ghosts on the Quad is a short interactive fiction project for the IF Speed Jam #2 that ended up being more of a demo than a full, short game. Oops! I'll try to give this a more polished and resolved set of endings in the future, potentially making it into a full game?  And adding more options / more diversity between paths, because as-is it's very samey across different paths. I hope you enjoy anyway!

Warnings: very mild ghosty themes; unintentional misgendering
